PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-08402011-07-29,  ,  PS,  , 
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectNo. 134 - (Nova Scotia) Provincial Emergencies Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER N° 134 - which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of NOVA SCOTIA with respect to the severe STORM that affected the province from November 4 to 10, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: No. 134 - (Nova Scotia) Provincial Emergencies Financial Assistance Order
precis: PROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER N° 134 - which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of NOVA SCOTIA with respect to the severe STORM that affected the province from November 4 to 10, 2010.
